statements: SELECT * FROM CourseInformation;
SELECT course_name, instructor_name, schedule FROM CourseInformation WHERE course_id = 1;
SELECT course_description FROM CourseInformation WHERE instructor_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM CourseInformation WHERE course_id BETWEEN 1 AND 5 ORDER BY course_id DESC;
SELECT instructor_name, COUNT(*) AS total_courses FROM CourseInformation GROUP BY instructor_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT course_name, instructor_name FROM CourseInformation WHERE course_id = 101;
SELECT * FROM CourseInformation WHERE course_name LIKE 'Intro%' ORDER BY course_id ASC;
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM CourseInformation WHERE instructor_name = 'John Doe' AND schedule = 'Monday';
SELECT course_name, instructor_name FROM CourseInformation WHERE course_id BETWEEN 200 AND 300 ORDER BY course_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM CourseInformation WHERE course_id IN (101, 202, 305) ORDER BY instructor_name, course_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM course_info;
SELECT course_name, schedule FROM course_info WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, course_name, instructor_name FROM course_info WHERE schedule = 'Monday';
SELECT course_name, description FROM course_info WHERE instructor_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM instructor WHERE bio IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM course_info WHERE id = 1;
SELECT course_name, description FROM course_info WHERE schedule = 'Mon-Fri';
SELECT course_name, instructor_name FROM course_info ORDER BY course_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM course_info WHERE instructor_name LIKE 'Jo%';
SELECT course_name, description, instructor_name FROM course_info JOIN instructor ON course_info.instructor_name = instructor.instructor_name;
SELECT * FROM course_info;
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM course_info;
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM course_info WHERE course_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM course_schedule ORDER BY schedule_date DESC, start_time ASC;
SELECT instructor_name, instructor_email FROM instructors;
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM course_info WHERE course_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM course_schedule WHERE instructor_id = 3 ORDER BY schedule_date DESC;
SELECT instructor_name, instructor_email FROM instructors WHERE instructor_id BETWEEN 2 AND 4;
SELECT course_id, course_name, course_description FROM course_info JOIN course_schedule ON course_info.course_id = course_schedule.course_id;
SELECT course_name, schedule_date, start_time, end_time FROM course_info JOIN course_schedule ON course_info.course_id = course_schedule.course_id WHERE schedule_date >= CURDATE();
SELECT * FROM Course;
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM Course WHERE instructor_id = 1;
SELECT course_name, instructor_name, department FROM Course JOIN Instructor ON Course.instructor_id = Instructor.instructor_id;
SELECT course_name, day_of_week, start_time, end_time FROM Course JOIN Schedule ON Course.schedule_id = Schedule.schedule_id;
SELECT course_name, instructor_name FROM Course JOIN CourseAssignment ON Course.course_id = CourseAssignment.course_id JOIN Instructor ON CourseAssignment.instructor_id = Instructor.instructor_id;
SELECT * FROM Course;
SELECT course_id, course_name FROM Course WHERE instructor_id = 1;
SELECT instructor_id, COUNT(course_id) AS num_courses FROM CourseAssignment GROUP BY instructor_id HAVING num_courses > 1;
SELECT c.course_name, i.instructor_name, s.day_of_week FROM Course c JOIN Instructor i ON c.instructor_id = i.instructor_id JOIN Schedule s ON c.schedule_id = s.schedule_id;
SELECT c.course_name, s.start_time, s.end_time FROM Course c JOIN Schedule s ON c.schedule_id = s.schedule_id WHERE s.day_of_week = 'Monday';
SELECT * FROM courses;
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM courses WHERE instructor_id = 1;
SELECT course_id, course_name, course_schedule FROM courses WHERE instructor_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM instructors;
SELECT instructor_name, email FROM instructors WHERE instructor_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM courses WHERE instructor_id = 1;
SELECT course_id, course_name FROM courses WHERE course_id < 5 ORDER BY course_id DESC;

SELECT course_schedule.day_of_week, course_schedule.start_time, course_schedule.end_time FROM course_schedule INNER JOIN courses ON course_schedule.course_id = courses.course_id WHERE courses.instructor_id = 2;
SELECT courses.course_name, instructors.instructor_name FROM courses INNER JOIN instructors ON courses.instructor_id = instructors.instructor_id WHERE instructors.email LIKE '%@example.com';

SELECT course_id, course_name, course_schedule.day_of_week, course_schedule.start_time, course_schedule.end_time FROM courses INNER JOIN course_schedule ON courses.course_id = course_schedule.course_id WHERE course_schedule.day_of_week = 'Monday';
